ComicInfo.Summary:
Spawn continues his journey towards New York, but unfortunately is caught in a battle with the klan itself. Spawn attempts to protect one of the last black families in the area, by slowly sabotages the lives of the Klan members.
Before spawn leaves, he finds the Klan leader, and leaves him a little suprise
ComicInfo.Teams: New York Police Department,Ku Klux Klan,Hellspawn
ComicInfo.Title: The Clan
